main.name: Tomasz Grzybowski
main.description: I am a BSc (Hons) Cloud Computing Degree graduate and Solutions Architect Intern at AWS. This website contains some information about me, my skills, projects and certifications.
main.bio: A curious problem solver that constantly looks for ways to improve processes and products. Focused on customers and their desired outcome to enable the growth potential by utilising cloud technologies to build elastic, cost-optimised and performant solutions.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in more information about me or just want to talk, feel free to use the form or details provided.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I learnt during my degree course.

education.description: Priciples of software and IT infrastructure design and development, cloud technologies, AWS, project and service management.
Foundations of business operations, business planning, business location, contract law, ethics and motivation, and many more.

work.title: Solution Architect Intern
work.description: Cloud solutions design for specific public sector customers' requirements, customer support and contact stakeholders on multiple levels.

work.title: Administrative Clerk
work.description: Schedule Planning, goods-in and despatch related problem solving, customer support, co-operation with management from different departments.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
